thread.title: uThukela buys three new water tankers | Northern Natal News
thread.title_full: uThukela buys three new water tankers | Northern Natal News

author: John Barnard
title: uThukela buys three new water tankers | Northern Natal News
text:
uThukela District Municipality yesterday (July 4) announced the acquisition of three new water tankers. According to uThukela, this was made possible through the co-operation of the Development Bank of South Africa.
“These tankers will significantly enhance our ability to provide emergency water supply during outages and in areas lacking water infrastructure.
Also read: MEC for Human Settlements inspects housing project in Acaciavale
“Each of the three water tankers has been allocated to a local municipality within uThukela, reflecting our strategic plan to improve service delivery across the district. This acquisition is a key part of our efforts to turn around the situation in our district and ensure that all residents have access to essential water services,” said uThukela.
T he news provided to you in this link comes to you from the editorial staff of the Ladysmith Gazette, a sold newspaper distributed in the Ladysmith area.
